channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Thousands of n8n instances under threat from top security issue
item.description: Despite being patched weeks ago, Ni8mare is still plaguing almost 60,000 instances, new data claims.

item.title: AI music is flooding Spotify, and subscribers are furious — here’s why music fans 'no longer trust Discover Weekly'
item.description: Have you noticed AI-generated music in Spotify? These users have, and they're done with it.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Season One has just been extended with new bonus rewards to 'allow extra time to further develop and refine Season 2 as a result of community feedback'
item.description: Battlefield 6 players will now have longer to complete the Season One battle pass as developer Battlefield Studios announces its extension.

item.title: Neo humanoid maker 1X releases world model to help bots learn what they see
item.description: 1X released a new world model that it says is a solid step toward its robots being able to teach themselves new tasks.

item.title: A new 'more interactive' Hellblade is reportedly in the works, but Ninja Theory is no longer working on its 'experimental' Project Mara title
item.description: A new report claims that Ninja Theory is no longer working on Project Mara and is, instead, now developing a third installment in its Hellblade series.

item.title: Fnac et Darty vendent au rabais de nombreux produits Tech lors des soldes d’hiver 2026
item.description: À la veille de la 2e démarque des soldes, Fnac et Darty fait le plein d'offres : on trouve des smartphones premium en pack à prix cassé, des TV à moitié prix ou encore des laptops performants en réduction. Découvrez toutes les offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: Boulanger dégaine déjà ses meilleures offres avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver battent leur plein et la deuxième démarque pointe déjà le bout de son nez. Chez Boulanger, les bonnes affaires s’enchaînent avec une pluie de réductions sur une large sélection de produits Tech. On a parcouru le site pour vous dénicher les meilleurs bons plans à ne surtout pas manquer.

item.title: Ce que Siri pourra faire grâce à Gemini
item.description: Gemini sera donc le nouveau cerveau de Siri. Apple fait en effet appel à Google et à ses modèles IA comme base pour les futures fonctions d'Apple Intelligence, et l'assistant sera un des premiers à en profiter. Reste à savoir pour quoi faire, et quelle sera la place de ChatGPT dans tout ça — car le bot d'OpenAI est déjà embarqué dans Siri…

item.title: Amazon lance une vague de promotions juste avant la 2e démarque des soldes
item.description: Même sans l’annoncer officiellement, Amazon casse les prix sur une multitude de produits Tech pendant les soldes. Et bonne nouvelle : la 2ᵉ démarque arrive à grands pas ! C’est le moment rêvé pour faire de vraies bonnes affaires et démarrer 2026 du bon pied.

item.title: The AI explosion isn't just hurting the prices of computers and consoles – it's coming for TVs and audio tech too
item.description: Price rises could be coming for all AV tech, and budget sets may get hit hardest

item.title: Google’s Veo now turns portrait images into vertical AI videos
item.description: Google is making its Veo 3.1 AI video model pay closer attention to the reference images you want generated clips to be based on. The company is releasing new visual improvements for the "Ingredients to Video" tool that was introduced last year, alongside expanding native vertical video support and resolution upscaling features. The Ingredients to […]...

item.title: Google’s update for Veo 3.1 lets users create vertical videos through reference images
item.description: Google is now allowing users to create vertical videos using references image.

item.title: Ponies release date: what time does the new Peacock TV show come out?
item.description: Emilia Clarke and Haley Lu Richardson's new spy thriller series arrives very soon – here's when and where you can watch it.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : quelles sont les meilleures offres à saisir sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty… ?
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver 2026 ont débuté la semaine dernière et les offres continuent de tomber sur Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Cdiscount et Boulanger. Smartphones, PC portables, téléviseurs, tablettes ou encore casques et écouteurs sans fil… Voici les meilleures offres Tech sélectionnées par la rédaction pour cette fin de première démarque.

item.title: Meta confirms Reality Labs layoffs and shifts to invest more in wearables
item.description: Around 10 percent of Meta's Reality Labs division, which develops its XR products and services, will be laid off beginning on Tuesday, as reported by Bloomberg. Meta spokesperson Tracy Clayton confirmed the layoffs in a statement to The Verge: "We said last month that we were shifting some of our investment from Metaverse toward Wearables. […]

item.title: Ce puissant laptop gaming Lenovo avec RTX 5070 + 32 Go de RAM se négocie à très bon prix pour les soldes
item.description: En ce moment, vous avez le PC portable gaming Lenovo Legion 5 15IRX10 pour 1 199,99 euros alors qu'il était proposé à 1 799,99 euros à sa sortie. Il y a déjà eu moins cher, mais ça reste un très bon prix compte tenu de la pénurie des composants.

item.title: I finally found an IKEA standing desk that fixes the two major design flaws I hate most
item.description: The Utmaning standing desk from IKEA ticks all the boxes, from cables to comfort.

item.title: Mise à jour Google Home : 20 nouvelles fonctions débarquent, voici ce qui change
item.description: Google Home gagne de nouvelles options pour créer des règles d'automatisation. Les possibilités sont nombreuses.

item.title: Dozens of ICE Vehicles in Minnesota Lack ‘Necessary’ Lights and Sirens
item.description: A contract justification published in a federal register on Tuesday says that 31 ICE vehicles operating in the Twin Cities area “lack the necessary emergency lights and sirens” to be “compliant.”

item.title: Apple’s Big Virtual Reality NBA Game Debut Demands More Interactivity
item.description: A Vision Pro is way cheaper than courtside tickets, though Apple's headset could offer something beyond a good view.

item.title: Newcastle vs Man City Free Streams: How to watch Carabao Cup 2025-26 semi-final online from anywhere
item.description: All the ways to watch Newcastle vs Man City live streams, with both sides hoping to gain an advantage in the first leg of this Carabao Cup semi-final.

item.title: Tesla met à jour le Model Y 2026 aux US : les 3 nouveautés principales, avec le retour d’une option demandée
item.description: On attendait tous la version longue venue de Chine, la Model Y L. Finalement, Tesla joue la carte du recyclage. Le Model Y 7 places fait son retour aux États-Unis sur la version 2026.

item.title: 1Password launches Unified Access as a one-stop shop for managing company credentials – say goodbye to shadow IT and SaaS sprawl
item.description: Forget about shadow IT and SaaS sprawl - 1Password's Unified Access capabilities can discover credentials for you and creates a secure, compliant platform to manage your applications.

item.title: Remarkable’s pricey Paper Pro is hundreds off with refurbished deals
item.description: If you compare the value proposition of getting one of Remarkable’s Paper Pro E-Ink tablets vs. buying a laptop, the latter will win in most scenarios. Laptops are more capable, with more ports, apps, and versatility — but they’re much more distracting, too. Avoiding distractions during work or while writing for leisure isn’t easy, and […]

item.title: Ventes de smartphones : Apple devient leader mondial, Samsung tremble et deux outsiders jubilent
item.description: Pour la première fois depuis 14 ans, Samsung n'est plus le premier constructeur mondial de smartphones. Porté par un succès de sa gamme iPhone 17, Apple vient de s'emparer de la couronne. Et le plus fou ? L'écart ne fait que se creuser. Les derniers chiffres de Counterpoint Research sont sans appel.

item.title: Apple Creator Studio suite is launching to take on Adobe
item.description: Apple has announced Apple Creator Studio, a new software suite for Apple products that bundles popular creative apps into an all-in-one subscription service. Apple Creator Studio will be available on the App Store on January 28th, and includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Pixelmator Pro, Motion, Compressor, and MainStage - providing a rival […]...

item.title: NBA League Pass is up to 55 percent off right now
item.description: NBA League Pass, the streaming service that lets you catch hundreds of out-of-market NBA games, is on sale right now for up to 55 percent off. The League Pass Premium subscription is on sale for $75, down from $160, while League Pass Standard is marked down to $50 from $110. We're almost halfway through the season at this point, so it makes sense for a service like League Pass to start offering some discounts. The Standard plan includes commercials and support for only one device at a time, while the Premium tier offers no commercials, in-arena streams during breaks in the game, offline viewin...

item.title: India reportedly tells quick-commerce firms to drop 10-minute delivery promise
item.description: India's labor ministry is pushing the country's booming quick-commerce sector to prioritize the wellness and safety of its gig workers.

item.title: The LG C5 OLED is still the best TV that we recommend in 2026 — and it just received a staggering $1,300 discount at Best Buy
item.description: The LG C5 OLED TV is still our best-rated TV of 2026, and the 65-inch model just received a staggering $1,300 discount, bringing the price down to £1,399.

item.title: Jony Ive and Sam Altman’s First AI Gadget May Try to Kill AirPods
item.description: Thank god someone is brave enough to take down many people's favorite wireless earbuds.

item.title: Hackers claim to have Target source code for sale following recent cyberattack
item.description: A Target database of almost 900GB was allegedly stolen and being sold in smaller batches.

item.title: Après Air France, le plus grand groupe aérien européen choisit également Starlink
item.description: Quelques mois après l'annonce d'Air France, c'est au tour de Lufthansa de jeter l'éponge face à ses partenaires historiques pour signer avec Starlink.

item.title: ElevenLabs CEO says the voice AI startup crossed $330 million ARR last year
item.description: The company said it took only five months to go from $200 million to $330 million in annual recurring revenue.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver : quoi de mieux que courir dans le froid avec une de ces 9 montres connectées à prix soldé ? Le TOP des bons plans
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver permettent de faire de bonnes affaires sur de nombreux produits Tech, dont les montres connectées ! Ces accessoires lifestyle & sport profitent eux aussi d’une vague de promotions : voici les offres à retenir.

item.title: Ubisoft announces layoffs at The Division studio Massive Entertainment and Ubisoft Stockholm amid restructuring efforts
item.description: Ubisoft has announced job cuts at The Division studio, Massive Entertainment, and Ubisoft Stockholm as part of ongoing cost-cutting efforts.

item.title: La France ne peut pas interdire les réseaux sociaux aux moins de 15 ans : le rappel à l’ordre du Conseil d’État
item.description: La proposition de loi visant à protéger les mineurs en ligne, examinée ce mardi 13 janvier en commission des Affaires culturelles de l'Assemblée nationale, est en passe d'être rabotée... après un avis du Conseil d'État. Le texte fait partie des trois initiatives législatives qui veulent interdire les réseaux sociaux aux mineurs.

item.title: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams accused of $2.5 million crypto ‘rug pull’ as his NYC Token crashes
item.description: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams has come under fire after his new cryptocurrency token crashed just hours following its launch on Monday. As reported by CoinDesk, Adams' "NYC Token" hit a $580 million market capitalization at its peak before plummeting to around $130 million at this time of writing. Data from the blockchain analysis platform, […]

item.title: Archaeologists in Sicily Discover an Ancient Stylus With an Erection. Yes, That Kind of Erection
item.description: The over 2,400-year-old ceramist's stylus likely features Dionysus...and his other bits.

item.title: Celebrate Lunar New Year with the Lego Spring Festival Good Fortune build while its over $37 off
item.description: The Lego Spring Festival Good Fortune set is on sale at Amazon for $52.60, down from the list price of $89.99. That's a 42% discount.

item.title: OpenAI reportedly readies lengthy Super Bowl commercial
item.description: OpenAI is planning another Super Bowl ad for 2026.

item.title: De nombreux produits Samsung sont à prix cassés durant les soldes : smartphones, TV, tablettes…
item.description: Samsung profite des soldes d’hiver pour proposer une avalanche de réductions sur ses meilleurs produits. Entre ses Galaxy S et A, ses téléviseurs QLED et OLED, tablettes et écouteurs sans fil, de nombreuses références phares de la marque sud-coréenne voient leur prix chuter, rendant le moment idéal pour s’équiper ou se faire plaisir à moindre coût. ...

item.title: Games Workshop Rejects the Abominable Intelligence
item.description: The makers of 'Warhammer' declare heresy on generative AI, banning its use in the company's design process.

item.title: I'm a lifelong iPhone user, but a few months with Gemini on Android have shown me exactly why Apple and Google's AI partnership is what everyone needs
item.description: For the first time in years, I’m excited about the future of the iPhone. And that excitement is coming from Google, not Cupertino.

item.title: Docusign’s AI will now help you understand what you’re signing
item.description: The company is rolling out new features to help signers understand contract terms and help contract creators more quickly set up agreements for signature. New AI tools from Docusign aim to make contracts easier to understand and quicker to prepare.

item.title: Toujours aussi léger, le vélo électrique Origine Montmartre fait toujours plus dans le Made in France
item.description: Dans sa version cadre ouvert, le vélo électrique urbain Origine Montmartre propose dorénavant une toute nouvelle courroie Hutchinson Crossdyn, fabriquée en France.

item.title: Samsungs new OLED TVs will probably be expensive. Meanwhile, the 2025 S90F OLED is almost 50% off.
item.description: The Samsung S90F is one of the best OLED TVs on a budget. The 48, 55, and 77-inch models are still at Black Friday pricing at Amazon.

item.title: Grow your card cache with 13% off the Pokémon TCG Mega Venusaur ex Premium Collection Box
item.description: As of Jan. 13, get 13% off the Pokémon TCG Mega Venusaur ex Premium Collection Box at Amazon.

item.title: CES is over, but Im still lusting for the Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold
item.description: Mashable's tech editor got to go hands-on with the upcoming Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold at CES 2026, and it left a lasting impression.

item.title: Dreame brings 8K video to compact action cameras
item.description: Dreame, a Chinese company known for its unique robot vacuums and floor cleaners, expanded its offerings at CES 2026, such as a $700 floor lamp that doubled as a hair dryer. But more interesting is the debut of the company's first action camera. The Leaptic Cube features a design similar to the DJI Osmo Nano […]

item.title: Trump is headed to this Detroit Ford factory to promote U.S. manufacturing
item.description: The president’s trip will include a visit to a Dearborn factory that make the F-150 pickup, a bestseller in the U.S. President Donald Trump will travel to Michigan on Tuesday to promote his efforts to boost U.S. manufacturing, trying to counter fears about a weakening job market and worries that still-rising prices are taking a toll on Americans’ pocketbooks.The day trip will include a tour of a Ford factory in Dearborn that makes F-150 pickups, the bestselling domestic vehicle in the U.S. The Republican president is also set to address the Detroit Economic Club at the MotorCity Casino.Novembe...

item.title: The RAM shortage driving up tech prices won’t end any time soon, Micron says
item.description: One of the bigger memory manufacturers believes the RAM shortage affecting tech prices may not end until 2028.

item.title: Proton's Lifetime account raffle raises $1.27 million for digital rights advocates
item.description: With the money generated from its 2025 Lifetime Account Charity Fundraiser, Proton has awarded grants to ten community-chosen groups defending privacy online and digital rights.

item.title: Marvel won’t let you forget Avengers: Doomsday is coming
item.description: A little over a year ago, Marvel spent the better part of an entire day slowly revealing the massive cast for Avengers: Doomsday. More recently, the studio started dropping teaser trailers featuring some of the movie's more notable superhero team-ups and returning characters. There was already plenty of hype around the project, which seems poised […]...

item.title: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams Accused of Crypto Pump and Dump With NYC Token
item.description: Adams has wasted no time finding his true calling.

item.title: Businesses are finally taking action to crack down on AI security risks
item.description: Nearly all business leaders agree AI will be the thing that changes their cybersecurity strategies the most this year.

item.title: Microsoft scrambles to quell fury around its new AI data centers
item.description: It looks like the wave of campaigns against data centers are getting under big tech companies' skin - and Microsoft is the latest giant to promise to address frustrations on the ground in communities around their data centers. The company announced a five-point plan today that it calls "Community-First AI Infrastructure." That includes paying more […]...
